info.title: Laravel API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Laravel Product Management System

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns an authentication token

items.example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a token

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's details
Returns a list of all products

post.description: Creates a new product and returns the created product data

get.description: Returns a specific product by ID

put.description: Updates a product and returns the updated product data

items.example: The price must be at least 0.

PriceAdjustmentAlgorithm.title: Price Adjustment Algorithm
PriceAdjustmentAlgorithm.description: Algorithm that automatically adjusts product prices based on stock levels

low_stock_threshold.description: Stock level below which prices are increased by 10%

high_stock_threshold.description: Stock level above which prices are decreased by 5%
